title: Davis: 'My job' to bring hope to forlorn Mavs fans
description: The Mavericks' fan base remains in shock over the trade that brought in Anthony Davis but sent away Luka Doncic, and the new Dallas big man says he understands the frustration.
author: Tim MacMahon

title: Dolphins' Hill 'loves' Miami, laments comments
description: Dolphins receiver Tyreek Hill says he and his family "love" being in Miami and he doesn't want to play elsewhere, despite comments at the end of the season that suggested otherwise.
author: Marcel Louis-Jacques

title: 'Not Fergie time, offside time' - Leicester rue lack of VAR as Man Utd progress
description: Ruud van Nistelrooy says his Leicester side were beaten not in "Fergie time, but offside time" as Harry Maguire's controversial late winner sends Manchester United into the FA Cup fifth round.

title: Man City's 115 charges outcome 'in a month' - Guardiola
description: Manchester City expect to learn the outcome of the hearing into their 115 charges of alleged Premier League financial rule breaches "in one month" says boss Pep Guardiola.

title: Keane: Don’t be fooled by win – Man Utd a 'bunch of strangers'
description: Roy Keane says Manchester United "look like a bunch of strangers" after they snatched an unconvincing 2-1 victory over Leicester in the FA Cup fourth round.

title: Emery relishing Rashford challenge as Keane questions move
description: Aston Villa boss Unai Emery is looking forward to the "huge challenge" of getting Marcus Rashford back to his best.

title: This officiating conspiracy theory could actually sway the Super Bowl outcome
description: No matter where anyone stands on the issue, what is undeniable is that the officiating crew for Super Bowl LIX is well aware of what is being said.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Tyreek Hill apologizes to Tua Tagovailoa, Dolphins teammates: 'I'm taking full accountability of what I said'
description: A month after saying that he wanted "out" of Miami, Hill appears to have changed his mind.
author: Yahoo Sports
